test_realistic_gui_suite.py.purpose: Realistic GUI Test Suite for FlutterReflect MCP Server
test_realistic_gui_suite.py.architecture: modular test framework with MCP server integration

patterns_discovered: MCP JSON-RPC communication pattern using stdin/stdout pipes
Modular test runner class with centralized result tracking
Resource cleanup pattern with try/finally blocks
UTF-8 encoding handling for output streams
Structured test reporting with success/failure/skip tracking
Initialization sequence with protocol version and capabilities negotiation
gotchas_discovered: UTF-8 encoding setup for Windows command line output
Subprocess resource cleanup and exception handling
MCP server connection initialization failure modes

approach_outcome.success_criteria: Established test infrastructure and MCP communication utilities
approach_outcome.what_worked: Clean architecture separation, proper error handling, comprehensive reporting system
approach_outcome.what_would_improve: Configuration management for executable paths, environment-specific initialization

recommendations: Extract executable path to configuration/environment variable
Add retry logic for MCP server initialization
Implement test discovery and auto-run mechanisms
Add logging infrastructure for better debugging
Create configuration file for different test environments
Add timeout handling for MCP communication
Implement test metadata and tagging system
